divs: sighting detailswe were traveling up at midnight 2 decades ago. these 3 blimp - type gondolas things (did not see the blimps, just the gondolas) they were 25 ft. off the ground, about 25 ft. flying at 25 mph. (so, you could see that it wasn't an aircraft, do not go that slow! they flew in an arc first parallel to us (me, a girlfriend, and daughter but i have not got in contact with in decades. we both had college educations.) then turned of about 30 degrees. could it have 3 blimps flying that late and that close together? i think goodyear have 3 total! yes, wright pat was 20 miles away, could be a test? they rolled down the windows (they were on the passenger side) and we here nothing! i got work the the next, told my story, was ridiculed, and that was the end of me telling my story! no need to get in contact with me, i just want to if blimps traveled at night! bugged me for decades! (name removed from report) cms 09\02\11 02:04 cst flg below you wanted a sketch. it was sort of like a lighted gondola.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Tipp City, OH
This sighting has never been favorited.
